title: TestDuplicateRule
description: A rule that defines the type of Identity duplicate(s) the user wants to detect

nbFilledAttributes.description: The number of filled attribute the identities shall contain to be eligible to the rule

nbEqualAttributes.description: The number of attributes that must be equal in the matched identity

nbMissingAttributes.description: The number of attributes that must be absent in the matched identity

priority.description: The execution order of the rule within the list of rules

active.description: Defines if the rule is active so that it can be used by the daemon

daemon.description: Defines if the rule is usable by the daemon

checkedAttributes.description: The list of attributes impacted by the rule

attributeTreatments.description: The list of specific attributes treatments
